intro: Randia pubifolia, commonly known as the hairy randia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of the Americas. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 12,000 species of flowering plants. Randia pubifolia is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and stream sides.
